column4: Hello, sorry to just burst in with a question, but I'm having an issue with svn on my VirtualBox ubuntu system. It has to do with permissions, and I was wondering if there's anybody with a little time to help me out?
just ask the actual question

when I chmod the folder to allow everyone full access, it's working properly
